snippet: Asset managers could face enforcement action for failing to give value for money from "dealing commissions" they charge customers for research and for executing share orders, Britain's Financial Conduct Authority said on Friday....

headline.main: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow
headline.print_headline: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow

lead_paragraph: Asset managers could face enforcement action for failing to give value for money from "dealing commissions" they charge customers for research and for executing share orders, Britain's Financial Conduct Authority said on Friday.
